desc: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.

comment: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.
desc: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.

comment: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.
desc: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.

comment: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.
desc: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.

comment: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"
desc: Your spells cost (1) less.

comment: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.
desc: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.

comment: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!
desc: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.

comment: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!
desc: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.

comment: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.
desc: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.

comment: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.
desc: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.

comment: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"
desc: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.

comment: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.
desc: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.

comment: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?
desc: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.

comment: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.
desc: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.

comment: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.
desc: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)

comment: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.
desc: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal 4 damage instead.

comment: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.
desc: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.

comment: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!
desc: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1)

comment: Another one bites the dust.
desc: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.

comment: We will always remember you, "Defender!"
desc: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.

comment: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.
desc: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.

comment: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!
desc: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.

comment: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.
desc: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.

comment: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.
desc: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.

comment: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9
desc: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.

comment: Easily worth 50 DKP.
desc: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

comment: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!
desc: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

comment: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.
desc: Enrage: +5 Attack.

comment: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath
desc: Divine Shield

comment: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.
desc: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.

comment: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".
desc: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.

comment: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?
desc: Windfury. Overload: (2)

comment: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.
desc: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.

comment: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.
desc: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.

comment: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.
desc: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

comment: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.
desc: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.

comment: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.
desc: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.

comment: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.
desc: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.

comment: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.
desc: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.

comment: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.
desc: Taunt

comment: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".
desc: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.

comment: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"
desc: Stealth

comment: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.
desc: Windfury

comment: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.
desc: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.

comment: It isn't really a circle.
desc: Restore 4 Health to ALL minions.

comment: They're only smiling on the outside.
desc: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.

comment: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto
desc: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.

comment: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.
desc: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.

comment: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.
desc: Silence a minion.

comment: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?
